recipe_for_meal: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut winter squash into cubes, and place on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil, salt and pepper. Roast in the oven for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally. In a large bowl, combine roasted squash cubes, citrus slices, and torn kale. Drizzle with a teaspoon of olive oil, a sprinkle of salt and pepper, and mix together. Serve in a bowl and enjoy!

Bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Add asparagus to the boiling water and cook 2-3 minutes until tender. Remove from heat and cool in an ice bath. In a large bowl, combine cooked asparagus, pea shoots, and cauliflower florets. Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Mix together and serve.

Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons of oil to the skillet. Once hot, add cabbage and radish, stirring occasionally. Cook for 3-4 minutes until vegetables are tender. Add citrus slices and stir fry for an additional 2 minutes. Add a splash of soy sauce, and season with salt and pepper. Serve over your favorite grain and enjoy!
